auth.login_subtitle: Gain access to the world right now.
auth.signup_title: Welcome! Sign up for a new world?
auth.signup_subtitle: Choose a method below to begin
auth.google_cookie_warning: Because the backend and frontend have different domains, please allow 3rd party cookies to use Google authentication. I will fix it later.

error.title: Oops!
error.description: Something has gone wrong, please try again later

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Change identifying details for your account

themes.title: Themes
themes.description: Customize the look and feel of the website

stream.title: Livestream
stream.description: Your next livestream information will be based on the information. It won't change even after livestream ends.
stream.title_description: If empty, the title will be generated automatically.
stream.thumbnail_description: If empty, the thumbnail will be generated automatically.

vods.title: VODs Manager
vods.description: Manage your VODs and edit their information here.

disable.title: Disabling your Let's Live account
disable.note: When you disable your account, your profile and notifications will be hidden, and your account will be deactivated. You can reactivate your account at any time.
